name: Avature: multi line sidebar text
description: Improves Avature's sidebar text avoiding text wrap, so more content can be seen even in two or three lines.
additional_info:
2018-06-18
* Changes for new UI
* Known bug: on mouse over, the close button overlaps and may cause a new line to be added, producing a flicking effect which is not so nice.

2017-05-25
* Remove drag & drop hint that was overlapping tabs
* Avature submenu is now not affected, only the main sidebar is
* (for QAs and Devs) Add support for sandboxes, iatsqa and iatsdbqa hosts

2017-02-13
* Update to support new UI

2016-06-02
* Initial release
* Jose's birthday :P
